title: The Pistons Are Optimistic About Detroit (Audio)
itunes:title: The Pistons Are Optimistic About Detroit (Audio)
description:
The Pistons may be at the beginning of a rebuilding cycle on the court, but downtown Detroit is already a success story. Michael Barr, Mike Lynch and Scarlet Fu speak with Pistons Chief Business Officer Mike Zavodsky. We talk about their strategy to returning the team to greatness and how the move to Little Caesars Arena has been a key part of reviving the city of Detroit. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
